entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -11.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 10:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
